STATE
v.
Robert Charles SINAPI. No. 274A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 10, 2004. William B. Crumpler, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jt., District Attorney, for State. John T. Hall, Kyle Hall, Raleigh, for Robert Charles Sinapi. Seth Jaffe, Raleigh, for ACLU-NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of August 2004 by American Civil Liberties Union of NC Legal Foundation, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 10th day of August 2004."
